item.title: COVID-19 Statistics
item.description: CDC COVID-19 Public Use Data Please note that all data had been obtained from the CDC Covid-19 Case Surveillance Data File.

item.title: IMBD Movies
item.description: IMDB ratings: Differences between directors Here we wish to doa small experiment, we want to see whether the mean IMDB rating for Steven Spielberg and Tim Burton are the same or not by seeing if the confidence intervals overlap.

item.title: Trump
item.description: Trump’s Approval Margins We start by importing the data files and cleaning them up ahead of our analysis.

item.title: Weather Anomalies Study
item.description: Climate change and temperature anomalies To study climate change, we found data on the Combined Land-Surface Air and Sea-Surface Water Temperature Anomalies in the Northern Hemisphere at NASA’s Goddard Institute for Space Studies.

item.title: Youth Risk Behavior Surveillance
item.description: Youth Risk Behavior Surveillance Every two years, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention conduct the YRBSS survey, where it takes data from high schoolers (9th through 12th grade), to analyze health patterns.
